card.name: Adriana, Captain of the Guard

card.name: Arcane Signet
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

card.name: Assemble the Legion
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a muster counter on Assemble the Legion. Then create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste for each muster counter on Assemble the Legion.

card.name: Court of Grace
card.text: When Court of Grace enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. If you're the monarch, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying instead.

card.name: Culling Ritual
card.text: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less. Add {B} or {G} for each permanent destroyed this way.

card.name: Cultivate
card.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Cut a Deal
card.text: Each opponent draws a card, then you draw a card for each opponent who drew a card this way.

card.name: Dragonmaster Outcast
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
